sources.title: First Man Into Space 1959 | Marshall Thompson, Marla Landi, Bill Edwards | Full Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
A remarkable and unexpected adventure takes flight! ! the first man in history to be rocketed into the terrifying unknown of outer space!
The first pilot to leave Earth's atmosphere lands, then vanishes; but something with a craving for blood prowls the countryside...

Original title: First Man Into Space (1959)

Colorized version https://youtu.be/IuTW8S-qU-E

Director: Robert Day
Writers: John Croydon, Charles F. Vetter, Wyott Ordung
Stars: Marshall Thompson, Marla Landi, Bill Edwards
Genres: Colorized classics, Drama, Horror, Sci-Fi
Budget: Â£100,000 (estimated)
